channel.title: shortcodes on Seung Hyun (Sam) Min
channel.description: Recent content in shortcodes on Seung Hyun (Sam) Min

item.title: Clarinet clips
item.description: Here are some of my favorite clarinet clips. I have watched them countless times. Tchaikovsky’s Nutcracker for the clarinet and orchestra His playing is so lyrical. He sings with the clarinet. I can listen to his playing all day. Rossini’s variation His articulation is god-level. His conducting is also god-level. Everything about this so god. His cadenza in the end is legendary! Spohr #2 He effortlessly plays this notoriously difficult piece.

item.title: Breathe by Lee hi
item.description: Breathe is one of my favorite songs. Many covers have been recorded. Here are my favorites. Original by Lee hi This is the original recording of the song. Han Dong Geun Han’s control of dynamic is amazing. His arrangement strays from the original but is absolutely beautiful. Kyu Hyun His voice is beautiful. Very clear and resonant. This rendition is very faithful to the original
